headline: How To Use 1.1.1.1 w/ WARP App And Cloudflare Gateway To Protect Your Phone From Security Threats
description: Starting today, you can get even more out of your 1.1.1.1 app. By adding Cloudflare Gatewayâ€™s secure DNS filtering to your 1.1.1.1 app, you can add a layer of security and block malicious domains flagged as phishing, command and control, or spam.
